name: graph_bar
description: Render a vertical bar chart with multiple bars, label text, dynamic sizing, and canvas styling.

canvas_id.description: Unique ID of the canvas to render on (e.g., 'canvas_001')

labels.description: List of labels for each bar (e.g., ['Q1', 'Q2', 'Q3', 'Q4'])

values.description: List of numeric values for bar heights (e.g., [20, 40, 35, 50])

color.description: Base color in hex format for the bar fill (e.g., '#3366cc')

title.description: Optional title displayed above the chart (e.g., 'Revenue by Quarter')

theme.description: Canvas color theme: 'light' or 'dark'. Default is 'dark'.

transparent.description: If true, background will not be rendered (transparent canvas)
